title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and server for running large language models locally (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc.) with a simple pull-run workflow.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client for the Ollama server; chat, embed, pull, list models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node, Deno and browsers; same surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration layer exposing Ollama models as LLM, chat and embedding components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web UI for any Ollama model; runs locally with Docker or pip.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API, streaming, and embedding support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that wraps ollama with chat history, syntax highlighting and keybindings.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot-like autocomplete server powered by Ollama code models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama server and models on Kubernetes.

title: ollama-chat-mac
summary: Native SwiftUI macOS menu-bar app that talks to local Ollama models.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri-based desktop GUI for Ollama with Windows, Linux and macOS builds.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker Compose examples for CPU and GPU (nvidia) deployments with volume caching.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for chatting, embedding and pulling models from Ollama.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama supporting .NET 6+, IAsyncEnumerable streaming and dependency injection.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Open-source Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app exposing Ollama models through async views, admin actions and REST endpoints.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: VS Code extension that adds a sidebar chat panel powered by any local Ollama model.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated list of custom Modelfiles and quantized GGUFs ready to pull into Ollama.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that brings local LLM summarization, continuation and Q&A to your vault.
